word_mean: 挛缩：由于支持肌肉或关节的组织纤维化或肌纤维病变，致使肌肉对被动性伸展具有稳定的高阻力

sentence.Network_en: Contracture occurs when the efflux of calcium is prevented by removing the extracellular sodium.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果除去细胞外液的钠而阻止钙外流,就会出现肌肉挛缩了.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To investigate the causes of bladder neck contracture ( BNC ) after transurethral resection of prostate.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的对经尿道前列腺电切术(transurethralresection ofprostate,TURP ) 后发生膀胱颈挛缩 ( bladderneck contracture,BNC) 的原因进行分析,提出预防措施.

sentence.Network_en: The results leaded to scar contracture and anastomotic stenosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果导致瘢痕性挛缩,吻合口狭窄.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... seizure 抓住，捕捉 contracture 挛缩 closure 关闭，结束.
treatment of gluteal muscle contracture with tendon lengthening ., 肌腱延长重建治疗臀肌挛缩症.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French, or from Latin contractura, from Latin contract- 'drawn together', from the verb contrahere

means.word_mean: 1. an abnormal and usually permanent contraction of a muscle

auth_sentence.content: Since the precise cause of Dupuytren's contracture is unknown, it's difficult to prevent.
